query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'relatorios_analise_loja' AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('conteudoRelatorio', 'resumo');
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'relatorios_analise_loja' AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('conteudoRelatorio', 'resumo');
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE	CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH
conteudoRelatorio	text	65535
resumo	text	65535
